column12: s mischievous Maltese has added blue dye to the water! For a white canine, Pumpkin is sporting an awful lot of blue fur. Although elsewhere a few of her incarnations have styled out a fluffy blue tail, I cannot fathom the decision behind that Sky-Blue Donald-Trump!

column2: ><font color=""#000000"" face=""Calibri"">So, outside of the target audience of giddy young children and the closeted adult Palace Pet collector, what is there for an AFOL here? Honestly, I was surprised by the number of yummy new pieces. Keeping in mind this is an &pound

column2: ><font color=""#000000"" face=""Calibri"">As a whole, the set blends nicely in amongst the other Cinderella Disney pieces. It&rsquo

column4: re thinking the blue dog won&rsquo
column5: t fit outside of the Disney theme, I have to add she looks enchanting fleshing out a fantasy forest with critters. Sure, she looks cute and defenceless &ndash
column6: and, yes, an obvious fit amongst the Elves critters - but pop her on a stack of bones outside a trolls&rsquo
column7: castle with some heavily sweating knights tentatively approaching? Do not mess with Blue Trump Pup!

column2: ><font color=""#000000"" face=""Calibri"">That said, whilst I have enjoyed mucking about with this charming little set, I am conscious of the play factor. Pumpkin can pootle about in her (Self-driving? Telekinetically-powered?) carriage or shelter in her grandiose dog house. She can have a sniffle of her flower, savage open her letter with those over-sized paws and smiling maw, drink from her jolly heart fountain... But this isn&#39
column3: t going to satisfy anyone as a stand-alone. As a top-up play set, it&#39
column4: s excellent. If the new Cinderella Juniors, or previously released&nbsp
column5: carriage/castle sets are about, this is a perfect addition... But independently, even for&nbsp
column7: animal-loving child, you will need to team it with something else if roleplaying playtime is on the agenda. Then again, what do I know at 25? Perhaps this telekinetic carriage talks and that will be sufficient for hours of adventuring up and down the dangerous terrain of the enchanted staircase and the mystical plain of the&nbsp
